code: @Override public void invoke() throws Exception {     for (Operation op : operations) {         try {             op.invoke().             if (Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {                 LOG.debug("Interrupting composite operation").                 Thread.currentThread().interrupt().                 break.             }         } catch (InterruptedException e) {             LOG.debug("Interrupting composite operation").             Thread.currentThread().interrupt().             break.         } catch (Exception e) {             LOG.error(e.getMessage(), e).         }     } }
